when you glue the four that stumps on to the boards sometimes the glue can get up
in the hole where the peg for the tree goes into and you really can't get that
glue out of the hole very easily so what I would do if that happens to you just
take a drill with the same size bit as the hole or just a little bit smaller
and then just drill through the board it'll get rid of the glue and it'll
clear out the hole for you so if that ever happens to you you know don't panic
just drill a hole through you can use your dremel tool or just a regular drill
bit with the small enough to fit into the stump hole and also as far as the
board's go don't feel you have to make it if you have a large wood or you want
to represent a large area on the on the tabletop don't feel you have to make a
